about_the_game:
Now inside the heart of a city riddled with crime, Everyone comes together with a shared objective: What kind of party will we have this Saturday night?

Join the senior class as they split off into they're respective cliques to see what excitement the city holds .

Let's hope, this time, everyone makes it home...



Rebels: Only the riskiest of people dare to hang out with this group of degenerates. The city maybe dangerous but the rebels may be that and more. If you value, well, your valuables, it's best to leave them behind before you go.


Each strung out on what shapes there personality, wondering around the Undercity with this group you may get lost into their world. Are the streets getting longer? Was the sky... always that color??


Trendies: This group leads the campus with loud gossip, loud music, and scandal on their side. Joining them can only lead you to the hottest spots in the city... just avoid ALL of heartstring's passes.


Freaks and Geeks: Let's play a game! Whoever wins get's bragging rights that there console's superior. What? You're on PC??
Hanging with this crowd can be both fun and exciting or an excruciating debate about fanbase preferences and how your's are wrong. Yes, there's a right answer apparently.


E-Faction: Don't let appearances deceive you, they'd be thrilled to have you along! Can't you tell by their welcoming, joyous expressions? So happy with life and all it's beautiful colors, the same colors that make pour Urchin's eyes water with pain. What would a group so ominous consider to be a fun night out...



Features
33k+ Word count

34 choices

5 outfits for MC

5 routes to explore

Experience the climax of the story
